title.en: A Happy Ending for Villains

description.en:
I was reborn into a romance fiction novel. I am lowborn, but there are plenty of boys here, and I get to work for the nobles.

But there’s a tiny problem. This noble family happens to be a family of villains, and I’m supposed to lead these serpents and throw the empire into chaos. Apparently, I am the greatest villain in this novel!

The deaths, the chaos in the empire, and the matters of inheritance locked the duke’s children and me into a corner of the manor. But the novel never mentioned anything about being locked away. So here, I must survive and grow… for a villainous happily ever.

title.en: I Turned Off The Pain Perception Setting!

altTitles.en: I Said I Turned off The Pain Perception Setting!
I'm Telling You, I Already Turned Off The Pain Perception Setting!

description.en:
**Pain Perception 0, Capture rate is 100!**

A virtual reality game with pain perception set to '0'.
I was the first to clear all endings, and started the final 100th playthrough... but something is off.

Suddenly, I have a strange disease with a terminal setting, and the capture target characters are starting to worry about me.

"I don't feel any pain, so should I pretend to be sick?"

Before I knew it, to the capture target characters, I became a noble hero enduring pain and sacrificing for world peace.

Since it has come to this, the concept for this playthrough is a terminally ill hero throwing herself for the world!

I must end it with a happy ending. This is my last playthrough in my life!

title.en: Kankei Kaizen wo Akiramete Kyori wo Oitara, Shiotaioudatta Konyakusha ga Karande Kuru you ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 関係改善をあきらめて距離をおいたら、塩対応だった婚約者が絡んでくるようになりました

altTitles.ja-ro: Kankei Kaizen wo Akiramete Kyori wo Oitara, Shiotaiou datta Konyakusha ga Karande Kuru you ni Narimashita

description.en:
"I was forced to take Beatrice as my fiancée. I was reluctant from the beginning."

Beatrice, the hated duke's daughter, knew that her fiancé, Prince Ernest, was saying that. She decides to keep her distance from the prince.

"Come to think of it, until now I've been so obsessed with Ernest that I haven't interacted much with other people. What a shame."

For some reason, Ernest, who has been avoiding her until now, is now actively getting involved with her, but she simply wants to enjoy her academy life with her good-looking Margrave son and her good-natured friends. It's coming–?!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1691gn/)
description.ja:
「ビアトリスは強引に俺の婚約者におさまったんだ。俺は最初から不本意だった」婚約者であるアーネスト王子がそう言っているのを知ってしまった、嫌われ者の公爵令嬢ビアトリス。彼女は王子と距離を置くことを決意する。「そういえば私は今までアーネスト様にかまけてばかりで、他の方々とあまり交流してこなかったわね。もったいないことをしたものだわ」気持ちを切り替え、美貌の辺境伯令息や気のいい友人たちと学院生活を楽しむ彼女に、今まで塩対応だったアーネストが、なぜか積極的に絡んでくるようになり――!?

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1691gn/)

title.en: My Master

description.en:
Prince Licht and the gardener's son, Jooin, grew up together despite their different social classes.

Jooin, a beta and a commoner, has had a crush on Licht, an alpha of royal blood, for a long time. However, Jooin knows that this love can never bloom since the prince must marry an omega and succeed the throne. Jooin eventually leaves Licht's side, despite Licht's request to have Jooin stay beside him as his Dongsaeng for the rest of his life.

Three years later, Jooin returns to the castle. Unable to overcome his feelings for the prince, Jooin becomes Licht's butler once again.

Licht never tried searching for Jooin after his departure. Jooin knows that their relationship won't be the same as before, but with Licht's mysterious attitude, Jooin becomes more and more involved with him...

title.en: Aristite Was Blessed With a Curse

altTitles.en: Aristité Was Blessed With a Curse

description.en: In the Kingdom of Strandeon, one man from each noble family is required to serve in the Order of the Royal Vine, and Aristité is chosen to fulfill this duty for House Theseus. One day, while the order is carrying out a mission, a witch places a curse on Aristité, saying that he’ll lose something important. Everyone in the order thinks that this curse is what transforms Aristité into a woman, but little do they know that Aristité, whose real name is Ariel, was a woman from the start. All the curse did was take away her special medicine that changes her voice. With the help of her friends and cousin, Ariel struggles to protect her secret, but someone in the order seems determined to expose her and land her in trouble...

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

title.en: The Ruler of the Land

description.en:
Bi-Kwang is a handsome young warrior who becomes a drooling mess whenever he sees a pretty girl. Out on the road he meets an extraordinary swordfighter with no name who is searching for a legendary master warrior. Bi-Kwang promises to aid the swordfighter if he lets Bi-Kwang meet his beautiful sister. Of course, it turns out the swordfighter is the sister, Hwa-Rin Dahm, and she must switch identities to keep the plot moving along. Bi-Kwang is immediately smitten, and thus we have a triangle involving only two people.

The story takes place in a setting in each side is trying to unify the Murim as a whole, and while this is taking place, Bi-Kwang who is extremely good at learning martial arts but doesn't want to learn it, gets into a deal where he takes the girl to see her grand father since he was the last person to see him before he disappeared and on the way he encounters many enemies and some friends (who show up from time to time) and he matures since he realizes why martial arts is so important and that he has been using it wrongly. (Source: MAL)

---

**Original manhwa:** [Korean](http://smart.dwci.co.kr/event/yulgang/yulgang_event.asp)

---
**Note:** Although there are many chapters listed as missing, nothing is actually missing. The numbering changed a few times, hence why it displays as missing. 
This manhwa was also made into a MMORPG.
description.ru: Эта манхва сосредоточена на жизненном пути молодого человека по имени Хан Би Кван, который сначала не разбирался в боевых искусствах, но его способность облегчить тело была эквивалентна способности чемпиона высшего класса. Он был таинственным образом назначен самым молодым учеником лидера тёмной секты, а также сильнейшим фехтовальщиком военного мира того времени, Чхон Ма Син Ганом, но он выглядел неохотно и казался равнодушным. Его происхождение связано с легендой из прошлого, а именно с бывшим лидером отряда дьявола, который, по слухам, погиб. Он отправляется в приключения, но, в конце концов, влюбляется в красивую пацанку по имени Дам Хва Рин, в любимую внучку одного из сильнейших старейшин белой школы, Императора Меча.

title.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm Official Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja-ro: Honzuki no Gekokujou Koushiki Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja: 本好きの下剋上~司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません~ 公式コミックアンソロジー

title.en: Chika Idol wo Kage de Sasaeru Ore

altTitles.ja: 地下アイドルを影で支える俺

altTitles.en: Supporting an Underground Idol from the Shadows

title.en: Shitsurenshita node Vtuber Hajimetara Toshiue no Onee-san ni Motemashita

altTitles.ja: 失恋したのでVtuberはじめたら年上のお姉さんにモテました

altTitles.ja-ro: Shitsurenshita node Vtuber Hajimetara Toshiue no Onee-san ni Motemashita

altTitles.en: I Was Heartbroken, So I Became A VTuber, But Then I Became Popular with the Older Ladies

description.en:
Shocked after Yuki Himemura found out that the club senpai he was crushing on got a boyfriend, he decided to become a VTuber—something both he and his senpai have always liked—and used his savings to assemble his equipment.

He gets his virtual character designed only to discover that it’s a 3D model of a cute girl and, in the process, unintentionally ends up portraying one!

Not only that but the person who designed and rigged his model and his favorite VTubers are starting to take a liking to him…?

(Synopsis via Novel Updates)
description.ja: ずっと想いを寄せていた部活の先輩に彼氏が出来た事を知った姫村優希は、ショックの余り先輩も自分も元々好きだったVtuberに自分がなってしまおうと貯金を叩いて機材を揃えてしまう。そして自分のバーチャル肉体をデザインしてもらったらなんとまさかの美少女3Dモデルで意図せず女の子になりきる事に!?

title.en: Mikane and The Sea Woman

altTitles.ja: ぼくと海彼女

description.en: It's not like I don’t belong here… One year ago, a young boy named Mikane moved back to a small island in Kyushu. The locals are warm, his father is brusque yet kind, and he has a good friend who worries for him. Despite having so much, Mikane feels dissatisfied and lonely. Then, one day, he saves a mysterious, beautiful woman from the sea. His meeting with this “onee-san” will drastically change his destiny!!
description.pt-br: Não é como se eu não pertencesse a este lugar... Há um ano, um menino chamado Mikane voltou para uma pequena ilha em Kyushu. Os habitantes locais são calorosos, seu pai é um tanto bruto, mas gentil, e ele tem um bom amigo que se preocupa com ele. Apesar disso, Mikane se sente insatisfeito e solitário. Então, um dia, ele salva uma linda e misteriosa garota do mar. Seu encontro com essa “onee-san” mudará drasticamente seu destino!!

title.en: Perfect Buddy

description.en: A fierce love collab at City Casual, the nations top men's magazine, between the bear-like leader of the planning team, Baik Youngchan, and the beautiful but prickly Design team lead, Seo Hyunsoo. After Seo Hyunsoo accidentally sees Baik Youngchan's naked body, he begins to question his sexual preference. What happens when Seo Hyunsoo gets involved with his office nemesis who he'd never dreamed of getting mixed up with?

title.en: The Reincarnation of the Influential Courtier

description.en: Each book is a debt of love. Each step forward is a mortal challenge.

title.en: Xuanmen Prodigal Son

description.en: This is a story about a prodigal son who, while squandering his money in various ways, beats up a group of destined men.

title.en: Daija ni Totsuida Musume

altTitles.ja: 大蛇に嫁いだ娘

altTitles.en: The Girl Who Married the Big Snake
The Girl Who Married The Great Snake

description.en: Miyo, a human girl dedicated as an offering to the snake, the lord of the mountain. Miyo was frightened in front of a large snake that had a big body and swallowed a fox, but her feelings gradually changed...

title.en: Ore no Shibou Flag ga Todomaru Tokoro wo Shiranai

altTitles.en: My Death Flags Show No Sign of Ending

altTitles.zh: 不知我的死亡flag将于何处停止

altTitles.ja: 俺の死亡フラグが留まるところを知らない

altTitles.fr: Des risques mortels n'arrêtent pas de m'arriver

description.en:
When he came to his senses, Hirasawa Kazuki, a normal university student, found himself in possession of the body of a game’s character. Moreover, it was Harold Stokes, the story’s most hated character who was even given the title『King of Trash』by the players. Myriads of landmines are just waiting for him to step on them, like death flags!  
  
Will Harold be able to clear the survival route while avoiding the countless death flags in his way?!
description.fr: Lorsqu'il reprend ses esprits, Hirasawa Kazuki, un étudiant universitaire normal, se retrouve en possession du corps du personnage d'un jeu. De plus, c'est Harold Stokes, le personnage le plus détesté de l'histoire, qui a même été baptisé 『Roi des connards』par les joueurs. L'histoire est un terrain miné qui n'attend que lui pour exploser ! Harold pourra-t-il se dégager un chemin de survie tout en évitant les innombrables "mines" de l'histoire ? Des myriades de mines attendent qu’il les écrase, comme des drapeaux de mort (Game Over)!

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

title.en: The World is Full of Monsters, So I Want to Live as I Wish

altTitles.en: The World Is Full Of Monsters Now, Therefore I Want To Live As I Wish

altTitles.ru: Мир полный монстров, в котором я желаю жить

altTitles.ja: モンスターがあふれる世界になったので、好きに生きたいと思います

altTitles.zh: 在充满怪物的世界里为所欲为

altTitles.ja-ro: Monster ga Afureru Sekai ni Natta Node, Suki ni Ikitai to Omoimasu

description.en:
[You have acquired experience points. Kudo Kazuto has risen to Level 1.]

Those words echoes through Kazuto's mind after he runs over a mysterious dog on his way home from work.

The next morning, he awakens to a changed world, full of vicious monsters. The world now features a game-like system of levels and skills, alongside danger at every turn. Will Kazuto be able to survive by leveling up and taking advantage of the special skill he acquired the previous night? 

Kazuto's survival adventure begins now!
description.ru:
Одним вечером, возвращаясь с работы, Кудо Казуто сбивает огромную собаку. В этот же момент он слышит голос, но не придаёт этому особого значения. Кадзуто даже не подозревает, что его жизнь и весь мир уже изменились: наш мир заполонили монстры, и он стал похож на игру.   
  
**Link :**   
- [Web Novel Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9418eg/)

title.en: Binetsu Kuukan

altTitles.ja: 微熱空間

description.en:
Akasegawa Naoya's mother remarried recently and he suddenly finds himself trying to get along with his new big sister Amane, a student of the prestigious Kasugano Girls' School. But his new big sister isn't like what you might first expect.  
  
(Serialized in "Rakuen Le Paradis", an anthology that comes out three times a year.)
description.es: La madre de Akasegawa Naoya se caso de nuevo recientemente y de repente se encuentra a si mismo intentando llevarse bien con su nueva hermana mayor Amane, una estudiante del prestigioso instituto de la Escuela de Chicas Kasugano. Pero su nueva hermana mayor no es como creerias inicialmente.
description.pt-br: A mãe de Naoya Akasegawa se casou novamente e de repente ele se vê tentando se dar bem com sua nova irmã mais velha Amane, uma estudante do prestigioso colégio feminino Kasugano. Mas sua nova irmã não era bem o que ele esperava.

title.en: A Former Delinquent Girl Falls in Love

altTitles.ja: 元ヤン娘、恋をする

description.en: Spin-off/Spiritual Sequel of the authors other work "The Mentor and the New Employee Who are Getting More and More Into Each Other"; with this story focusing on the mask wearing former delinquent and her budding romance with the little brother of the Female MC of the previous work.

title.en: Pretty Haru

description.en:
As children, Lee Haru and Yun Dong-Ha made a promise, one to become a famous baseball player, the other a ballerina. When Lee Haru departs for Russia, they both decide that when they meet again they'll become a couple.  
  
Fast-foward several years, and Dong-Ha, now a feared deliquent, is excited to find out Lee-Haru is returning to his school. Expecting to meet a gorgeous, skinny ballerina, he is rather dismayed to find out Haru hasn't exactly turned out the way he expected.

title.en: Miss Kitty and Her Bodyguards

altTitles.zh: 凯蒂小姐和她的保镖们

altTitles.zh-hk: 凱蒂小姐和她的保鏢們

description.en: Follow Anna's daily life with her bodyguards!

title.en: Konna Amai Koto, Shiranai...

altTitles.en: こんな甘いこと､知らない…っ。

description.en: I didn't know there were so many kinds of "sweetness" before meeting Hanae san

title.en: Lover Next Door

description.en:
Let’s go, babe.”  
“Excuse me??? I was just making my way through!!  
  
SiHyuk, who was able to get a studio with good conditions, suffers from insomnia due to frequent lover’s quarrel between the couple next door.  
  
Then one day, he runs into the couple who happened to be having a dispute out in the hallway.  
  
SiHyuk gets involved with one of the two, JaeHee, and ends up becoming his pretend lover.  
  
With JaeHee’s ex, SoWool, being obsessive with JaeHee and acting like a stalker, what kind of fate awaits for SiHyuk and JaeHee who got into a pretentious relationship to shake SoWool off…?

title.en: Cyboy

altTitles.th: CyBoy ป่วนหัวใจนายไซบอร์ก

altTitles.ja: サイボーイ -改造少年-

description.en: When he was younger, Kujou Kiyosumi was incredibly awkward and nerdy. One day in elementary school, he courageously confessed his love to a girl, but she told him in front of the whole classroom that he was 'disgusting' to be around. Shocked, Kiyosumi asked the coolest guy in the class, Sagiya Maki, to help him become more likable, too. Thus, began the days of training and now in high school, he had finally achieved most popular status alongside Maki. Everything seemed to be going along smoothly until…

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

title.en: Today's Walk

altTitles.ja: 今日のさんぽんた

description.en:
The story of a dog, Ponta, and his walker, Rieko.

---
**Support the author's:**
- [Social Media and Shop](https://potofu.me/rikirosso)

title.en: Countach

altTitles.ja: カウンタック

description.en: The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun recieves a letter… from himself? The letter was from Shun 25 years ago for his future self. The letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

title.en: Buddy Go!

altTitles.ja: バディゴ！

description.en: Shizuku Ishiai, a 2nd year middle school student, loves dancing, but is bad at expressing herself, so she crossdresses and posts videos of her dances on the popular website "Smile Douga," under the alias "Ai." And she had declared the "dancing prince," Hayate, her rival. But, after a few unexpected events, and her attempts to best him, she's somehow thrown into an idol unit with him; furthermore, a MALE one?!

title.en: Oni GF

description.en:
As children, Billy promised Kirika, an oni girl, that he would always protect her even after they got older. Ten years have passed since that promise and it looks like the roles have reversed?
___
Original comic posted by PeaCh88 on twitter.

[**Author's Twitter**](https://twitter.com/pcmaniac88)    
[**Patreon**](https://www.patreon.com/PeaCh88)
[**Webtoon Version**](https://www.webtoons.com/en/challenge/oni-gf/list?title_no=843815)
description.pt-br: Quando crianças, Billy prometeu a Kirika, uma garota oni, que iria sempre a proteger mesmo depois de mais velhos. Dez anos já se passaram desde essa promessa e parece que os papeis se inverteram?

title.en: The Last Human

description.ar: تسو تيانشين هو آخر إنسان حي في مدينة مليئة بالزومبي. فقط عندما كان متأكداً من أنه مات ، يجد روحه تعود إلى ما قبل ذلك اليوم المشؤوم قبل عشر سنوات. يقسم أنه سوف يحمي الناس المهمين له هذه المرة ويجتمع مع عشيقته. تابعوا نضاله من أجل البقاء بمساعدة ذكرياته للسنوات العشر القادمة!
description.en: Zuo Tianchen is the last living human in a mutated zombie-infested city. Just when he was sure he'd died, he finds his soul returned to just before that ill-fated day ten years ago. He swears he'll protect the people important to him this time round and reunite with his past lover. Watch his struggles to survive equipped with his memory of the next ten years!
description.fr: uo Tianchen est l'un des derniers survivants sur terre depuis qu'une épidémie venant de l'espace s'était abattue sur terre, il l'y a de cela 10 ans. Alors qu'il est sur le point de mourir, Zuo fît donc ses adieux à sa petite amie qu'il avait rencontré durant l'épidémie. C'est alors que, d'un coup, alors qu'il était sur le point de mourir, il retourna dans le temps 10 ans auparavant, quelques heures avant le début de l'épidémie. C'est alors qu'il décida de sauver son meilleur ami qui avait périt dès le début de l'épidémie, 10 ans auparavant, et c'est alors qu'il se met à la recherche de sa copine qu'il avait dans l'ancienne apocalypse.
description.ru:
Зе Тянчен – последний выживший человек в городе, зараженном зомби-инфекцией. Будучи на грани смерти, он внезапно оказался в своем теле десять лет назад, когда город еще не был заражен. Он решил, что в этот раз спасет близких ему людей и воссоединится со своей старой любовью.   
  
Следите за его приключениями, в которых он использует свои воспоминания о следующих 10 годах, чтобы выжить и спасти своих близких!

title.en: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Clayman Revenge

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件: クレイマン Revenge

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Clayman's Revenge

altTitles.ru: О моём перерождении в слизь: Месть Клеймана

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسد فيه كسلايم: انتقام كلايمان

altTitles.tr: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Clayman'in İntikamı

altTitles.uk: Про моє переродження в слиз: Помста Клеймана

description.en:
Walpurgis ended with echoes of a public condemnation. It seems as if a clown's dream has already ran its course. But as if fate was pranking, or the world has other plans, the  supposedly dead Clayman has been resurrected from the dead. Is it the beginning of his dark era once more...?

A new spin-off "Tensura" manga written by the original author Fuse himself!
description.ja: ワルプルギスに響き渡った断末魔。道化の夢は一度は尽きたかと思われた。しかし運命のイタズラか、世界の選択か、死んだはずのクレイマンは復活し、再び暗躍を始め･･･る？
description.es-la:
Este Manga Spinoff es una historia alternativa que sucede luego de los eventos del Volumen 6 de la Novela Ligera.

Historia alternativa que continua despues de los eventos del Volumen 6 de la Novela Ligera. - El Walpurgis habia terminado con el grito de su muerte. Parecia que el sueño del arlequin habia llegado a su fin. Sin embargo, ya sea por una broma del destino o una decisión del mundo, Clayman quien supuestamente murio, ha resucitado una vez mas. ¿Es el comienzo de una nueva era oscura...?

title.en: Gochuumon wa Usagi desu ka?

altTitles.ja: ごちうさ
ご注文はうさぎですか？

altTitles.zh: 请问您今天要来点兔子吗

description.en: One day, Cocoa arrived in a town for a work-stay program as organized by her school. There, she excitingly entered the café "Rabbit House," expecting to be able to cuddle rabbits, but instead she found the Kafuu residence, her new home where she will be staying. In this town she will meet her precious and important friends, a responsible, calm but cute girl named Chino, a tough and soldier-esque girl named Rize, a spacey and quintessentially Japanese girl named Chiya, and the ordinary but dignified Syaro.

title.en: The Hero and the Sage, Reincarnated and Engaged

altTitles.ja: 英雄と賢者の転生婚～かつての好敵手と婚約して最強夫婦になりました～

altTitles.ja-ro: Eiyuu to Kenja no Tensei Kon ~Katsute no Koutekishu to Kon'yakushite Saikyou Fuufu ni Narimashita~

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Marriage of a Hero and a Sage: After Becoming Engaged to a Former Rival, We Became the Strongest Couple

altTitles.pt-br: Reencarnado • O herói se casa com o sábio ~Depois de ficar noivo de um ex-rival, nos tornamos o casal mais forte~

description.en:
Reid, a young hero with the strongest physical strength, and Elria, a beautiful sage with the strongest magic prowess.

They continued to fight as rivals in opposing enemy nations, but their relationship came to an end with the sudden death of Elria… Then, a thousand years later,

Reincarnated in a world where magic reigns supreme, but he who has retained the strongest physical strength from his previous life, Reid, was reunited with Elria, who has also been reincarnated―

“Hey, Reid— I want you to marry me.”

“…Huh?”

The two, who have become the strongest unaware lovey-dovey couple in a thousand years, enrolled in the Royal Magic Academy to decide who is stronger!
description.ja: 英雄・レイドと賢者・エルリアは長きに渡り戦っていたが、賢者の死により戦いは唐突に終わる。レイドは敵国に乗り込みエルリアの遺体の前で壮絶な死を遂げた…と、思ったら自分は赤子で世界は千年後に!?
description.pt-br:
Reid, um jovem herói com a maior força física, e Elria, uma bela sábia com a maior habilidade mágica.

Eles continuaram a lutar como rivais em nações inimigas opostas, mas seu relacionamento chegou ao fim com a morte repentina de Elria... Então, mil anos depois,

Reencarnou em um mundo onde a magia reina suprema, mas aquele que manteve a força física mais forte de sua vida anterior, Reid, se reuniu com Elria, que também reencarnou—

"Ei, Reid, quero que você se case comigo."

"…Huh?"

Os dois, que se tornaram o casal amoroso inconsciente mais forte em mil anos, matricularam-se na Royal Magic Academy para decidir quem é mais forte!

title.en: Maou Toubatsu Shita Ato, Medachitakunai node Guild Master ni Natta

altTitles.ja: 魔王討伐したあと、目立ちたくないのでギルドマスターになった

altTitles.en: After Defeating the Demon Lord I Did Not Want to Stand Out, So I Decided To Become a Guild Master

description.en:
The Kingdom of Albein was blessed with the appearance of the Miracle children, individuals with the greatest talents ever seen. Despite being around ten years old, with abilities many times stronger than the average adventurer, they managed to reach a strength score exceeding 100,000 points, granting them the adventurer grade SSS. With a mere party of five persons, they defeated the Demon Lord regaining the kingdom's peace.  
  
After that journey, Dick Silver, the most balanced between them, racked his brain to not draw public attention. In the end, he decided to become the guild master of a suburban guild as a reward, becoming its twelfth successor. After five years he reached his aim and then became a regular of his own guild's bar. But one day, as he was drinking at the bar as always, the daughter of a certain aristocrat came to pay him a visit.
description.ja: SSSランクの強さを認められた若すぎる５人の冒険者――『奇跡の子供たち』。その一人、ディック・シルバーは討伐したはずの魔王をメイドに従え、ギルドマスターになった。彼のギルドにはほかのギルドでは相談できない依頼だけでなく、ディックに密かに想いを寄せる『奇跡の子供たち』のメンバーが訪れ……。このギルドはどんな依頼も解決する――ただし目立たないように。

title.en: Shokei Sareta Kenja wa Lich ni Tensei Shite Shinryaku Sensou wo Hajimaru

altTitles.ja: 処刑された賢者はリッチに転生して侵略戦争を始める

altTitles.ru: Казненный мудрец переродился в некроманта и начал тотальную войну

altTitles.ar: الساحر العائد للإنتقام من العالم~الساحر الذي تم إعدامه أعيد إحيائه كليتش وبدأ حرب ضد الجميع

altTitles.th: จอมปราชญ์ผู้มีกายาเป็นลิช
ปราชญ์เกิดใหม่เป็นลิช

altTitles.ko: 처형당한 현자는 리치로 전생하여 침략 전쟁을 시작한다

altTitles.id: Sage Yang Dieksekusi Reinkarnasi Menjadi Lich Dan Memulai Perang Habis-Habisan

altTitles.en: The Executed Sage Who Was Reincarnated as a Lich Started an All-Out War

description.en: The Sage Dwight, he along with the Hero defeated the Demon Lord who sank the world into darkness. However, they were falsely accused of becoming the next Demon Lords because of his power, and were thrown to The Valley of the Dead to die... But though his flesh has rotten away, he lives on as a skeleton because of his grudge against the world. Dwight has vowed to deny that wrong world, and with a power that surpasses even the Demon King of the past, and also leading countless Skeletons he's going to start an all out war...!
description.ja:
かつて勇者と共に世界を闇に沈めた魔王を討伐した英雄、賢者ドワイト。
しかし、その力から次代の魔王になるつもりだと無実の罪を着せられ、
死者の谷へ落とされ命を落とす…。
しかし、肉が腐り落ちるも、この世への執念からスケルトンとして
生き永らえていたドワイトは、この間違った世界を否定する事を誓い、
かつての魔王をも凌駕する力で無数のアンデッドを率い、侵略戦争を開始する…！

---
- [Web Novel (Raw)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0651fj)
description.pt-br:
O Sábio Dwight, ele junto com o Herói derrotou o Lorde Demônio que afundou o mundo na escuridão. No entanto, eles foram falsamente acusados ​​de se tornarem os próximos Lordes Demônios por causa de seu poder, e foram jogados no Vale dos Mortos para morrer…

Mas embora sua carne tenha apodrecido, 
ele vive como um esqueleto por causa de seu rancor contra o mundo. Dwight jurou negar esse mundo errado, e com um poder que supera até mesmo o Rei Demônio do passado, e também liderando incontáveis ​​esqueletos. ele vai começar uma guerra total...!

title.en: I Look Too Much Like The Boss And The World Actually Believes It

altTitles.zh: 长的太像BOSS，结果世人真的信了

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhang De Tai Xiang BOSS, Jieguo Shiren Zhen De Xinle
Zhǎng De Tài Xiàng BOSS, Jiéguǒ Shìrén Zhēn De Xìnle

altTitles.en: The Appearance is so BOSS-like, Yet Everyone Believes it

description.en: Moon Lord, Suliang! Tamer of the Divine Lunar Morpho Butterfly, a familiar with abilities to control time and space, yin and yang, I am the invincible youth that stands at the apex of this world! To get such a status upon reincarnation is like getting dealt Pocket Aces… Divine my Arse! The beast in my body is nothing like the Divine Lunar Morpho! It’s clearly the lowest of low level Flash Butterfly!!! Facing millions of fanatical believers, a death match with Emperor Cangyue in three years time, and various sects viewing me as a thorn in their side… This is really an unprecedented beast tamer crisis!
description.zh: 月之王，苏凉！操纵着能回溯时空、逆转阴阳的月神闪蝶，以此站在这个世界的顶点的无敌少年！ 穿越而来就拿到这么NB的身份卡，岂不是天胡开局……个屁咧！ 我体内的宠兽，哪是什么月神闪蝶！！根本只是个只能照明的最最最低阶的闪光蝶！！！ 面对数以百万的狂热信徒、三年后约战的沧月大帝、视自己为眼中钉的各大教派…… 这还真是…… 前所未有的御兽大危机！

title.en: Sometimes Even Reality Is a Lie!

altTitles.ja: 現実(リアル)もたまには嘘をつく
現実もたまには嘘をつく
ゲーム好きの友達と色々する話

altTitles.ja-ro: Real mo Tama ni wa Uso wo Tsuku
Gemuzuki no Tomodachi to Iroiro suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: Hanging Out with a Gamer Girl

altTitles.uk: Іноді навіть реальність може бути оманливою

altTitles.hi: कभी कभी सच भी झूठ होता है!

altTitles.zh: 和喜欢游戏的朋友各种轶事

altTitles.zh-hk: 和喜歡游戲的朋友各種軼事

altTitles.vi: Đi chơi cùng nữ game thủ
Hẹn hò cùng nữ game thủ

description.en: Kaoru Terasaki is a gamer who’s into MMORPGs, and he’s finally meeting up with someone he’s been friends with in-game for a long while—this time, offline and in person. He’s worried that his friend will be disappointed to see Kaoru is a guy, unlike his female character in the game. But he’s the one who’s in for a surprise when, instead of another guy, his friend turns out to be a cute girl, Nanami Osaka. On top of that, Nanami told her parents that she would be bringing a friend over—a female friend. Even worse, Nanami’s dad is the super overprotective type who won’t allow any guys near his daughter. There’s only one solution to this dilemma: Kaoru has to cross-dress as a girl! Will Kaoru’s efforts pay off in the end?! Will Kaoru and Nanami remain just friends, or will their time together IRL change everything? Follow their romantic-comedy adventures to find out!
description.fr: Terazaki Kaoru est sur le point de rencontrer son ami en ligne, Nanami. Mais Nanami ne sait pas que Terazaki est en réalité un homme dans la vie réelle! Il sera certainement déçu et dégouté. Mais Terazaki va lui avoir aussi une surprise…
description.id:
Terazaki Kaoru akan bertemu dengan salah satu teman dari Game Online yang dia mainkan bernama Nanami. Namun, Nanami hanya tahu kalau Kaoru di dalam Game adalah karakter perempuan imut yang bernama Kaori, tapi dia tidak tahu kalau Kaoru di dunia nyata sebenarnya adalah seorang laki-laki.

Saat bertemu dengannya nanti, Nanami pasti akan kecewa dan merasa sedikit aneh, namun… Ketika bertemu, Kaoru pun sontak ikut terkejut. Karena Nanami ternyata…
description.it: Terazaki Kaoru sta per incontrare il suo amico di internet, Nanami. Ma Nanami non sa che Terazaki è un ragazzo nella realta! Con questo Nanami Potrebbe rimanerci delusa o forse trovarlo strano (considerando che l' avatar di Kaoru è femminile), ma ciò che il ragazzo non sa, è che riceverà una sorpresa a sua volta…
description.ja:
友達以上、恋人未満のふたりが繰り広げるハイテンションラブコメディ!

ゲーム好きな男の子、薫はネットゲームで知り合った男性と駅で待ち合わせ。女性キャラを使っていたせいで女の子だと勘違いされていることを心配する薫だが、待ち合わせ場所にやってきたのはかわいい女の子で……?
description.pt: Terazaki Kaoru está prestes a encontrar seu amigo de internet, Nanami. Mas Nanami não sabe que ele é um cara na vida real! ele pode se decepcionar ou ao menos achar estranho (considerando que seu avatar é feminino), mas Terazaki está prestes a ter uma surpresa…
description.ru:
Заядлый геймер Каору Тэрадзаки собирается встретиться с подругой Нанами, с которой познакомился в онлайн-игре. До этого они не виделись в реальной жизни, так что Нанами не знает, что, хотя в игре Тэрадзаки использовал женского персонажа, в реальной жизни он — парень. Каору убеждён, что Нанами наверняка будет разочарована этим фактом, но его ждёт сюрприз...

(Source: [shikimori](https://shikimori.one/mangas/124209-real-mo-tama-ni-wa-uso-wo-tsuku))
description.uk: Каору Теразакі — геймер, котрий захоплюється MMORPG, там він знайшов друга, з котрим товаришував протягом досить тривалого проміжку часу. І ось настав час зустрітися з ним особисто – поза межами онлайн. Та все не так просто, як здавалося на перший погляд, так як Каору грав під дівочим аватаром, його товариш вважає, що той – дівчина. Каору знаходиться у тривожному передчутті, що як його друг буде розчарований? Ба більше, на нього також чекав сюрприз – замість іншого хлопця, його другом виявляється симпатична дівчина – Нанамі Осака. До того ж, Нанамі заздалегідь попередила батьків, що приведе з собою друга – подругу. Ситуація ускладняється тим, що у Нанамі занадто турботливий тато, котрий віддубасить кожного хлопця, котрий посміє наблизитися до його доньки. Ця дилема має лише одне рішення: Каору треба переодягтися в дівчину! Чи окупляться зрештою зусилля Каору?! Чи залишаться Каору та Нанамі просто друзями, чи час, який вони провели у реальному житті разом, все змінить? Слідкуйте за їхніми романтичними пригодами, щоб дізнатися!
description.pt-br: Terazaki Kaoru está prestes a encontrar seu amigo de internet, Nanami. Mas Nanami não sabe que ele é um cara na vida real! ele pode se decepcionar ou ao menos achar estranho (considerando que seu avatar é feminino), mas Terazaki está prestes a ter uma surpresa…

title.en: On and Off: Work-Life Imbalance

altTitles.ja: 会社と私生活－オンとオフ－

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaisha to Shiseikatsu: On to Off

altTitles.es-la: Vida Empresarial y Privada: ON y OFF

altTitles.en: Company and Private Life: On and Off

description.en:
Working people have company (on) and private lives (off). 

Meet two office workers whose professional lives "on" the clock and private lives when they’re "off" couldn't be more different. He dresses like a lolita. She dresses like a punk. 

When their contrasting "on" and "off" modes collide, it inevitably leads to heart-pounding antics!

---

A serialization of the [Twitter series](https://mangadex.org/title/0fa5d834-fdab-4ac4-b3c9-821f1580f991/company-and-private-life) about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.
description.ja:
働く二人の大変身（メタモルフォーゼ）日常譚！
働く人々には会社（オン）と私生活（オフ）がある。ある人は会社員と女装ロリィタ。ある人は会社員と男装パンク。オンとオフのギャップにキュン必至！ 働く二人の大変身（メタモルフォーゼ）日常譚！X（旧:Twitter）にて累計200万いいね突破の話題作が、イラストから完全コマ割りでコミックス化！
description.es-la: Estos trabajadores tienen una vida en la empresa (ON) y otra privada (OFF). El es un oficinista que se viste de Lolita. Ella es una oficinistas que se viste de punk.

title.en: The Hundred Ghost Stories That Led to My Death

altTitles.ja: 僕が死ぬだけの百物語
Boku ga Shinu dake no Hyakumonogatari

altTitles.en: Hundred Ghost Stories of My Own Death

description.en:
One day, an elementary school child named Yuuma tries to jump out of his classroom window. His classmate Hina stops him and, in a bid to stall for time, asks him, “Do you know the round of a hundred ghost stories?” Hina tells Yuuma about a ritual where, if you tell a hundred ghost stories, you’ll see ghosts afterward. Learning this gives Yuuma a new lease on life. Chapter by chapter, he shares ghost stories with the reader, slowly but surely inching his way toward one hundred…

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
description.pt-br: Série de terror antológica detalhando a "Rodada das 100 Histórias de Fantasmas", muitas vezes usado como um teste de coragem, onde os participantes contam cem histórias sobrenaturais,  apagam uma vela e se olham no espelho depois de terminar cada história. Quando a centésima vela é apagada, diz-se que fantasmas e demônios são convocados ao nosso mundo. Um antigo conto popular originário do Japão recontado por de Yuuma, um menino que vive em uma casa problemática.

title.en: Kukkoro-chan and the Shota Prince

altTitles.ja: くっころちゃんとショタ王子

altTitles.en: The Lady Knight & The Little Prince

description.en:
The story of both a female knight who, when captured by the enemy country, declared "Kill me", and an adorably radiant prince. 

A wholesome tale.
___
Buy on [BOOTH](https://booth.pm/ja/items/5773323).

title.en: Black Lagoon: Sawyer the Cleaner - Dismemberment! Gore Gore Girl

altTitles.ja: BLACK LAGOON 掃除屋ソーヤー 解体！ゴアゴア娘

altTitles.ja-ro: Black Lagoon Soujiya Sawyer - Kaitai! Gore Gore Musume

altTitles.ru: Черная лагуна: Расчленяющая уборщица Сойер! Окровавленная девушка

description.en: Sawyer is a cleaner who takes on the task of disposing of unwanted people in Roanapur, a city of vice where the mafia and other scoundrels thrive. Her daily life is depicted in a funny, sometimes horror-filled, sometimes action-packed, and even fantastical way as she goes about her work with her beloved chainsaw in hand. Her good friends and fellow freelancers Shenhua and Lotton, as well as familiar characters from the main story, such as Revy and Rock, also make appearances!

title.en: Madame Petite

altTitles.ja: マダム・プティ

description.en: It's the 1920s and Mariko, age 16, is married to a man 30 years her senior. She is honestly happy to be his wife and really excited to board the Orient express in Turkey on their honeymoon trip. But her life takes a rapid turn when her husband is discovered dead after the first night on board… And that's only the start of Mariko's great adventure.

title.en: Yuusha Party o Tsuihou Sareta Beast Tamer, Saikyou Shu Nekomimi Shoujo to Deau

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha Party wo Tsuihou Sareta Beast Tamer, Saikyou Shu Nekomimi Shoujo to Deau
Yuusha Party wo Tsuihou Sareta Beast Tamer, Saikyou Shuzoku Nekomimi Shoujo to Deau

altTitles.ja: 勇者パーティーを追放されたビーストテイマー、最強種の猫耳少女と出会う
勇者パーティーを追放されたビーストテイマー、最強種族の猫耳少女と出会う

altTitles.ko: 용사 파티에서 추방당한 비스트 테이머, 최강종인 고양이귀 소녀와 만나다

altTitles.zh-hk: 被勇者隊伍開除的馭獸使、邂逅了最強種的貓耳少女

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha Party wo Tsuihou Sareta Beast Tamer, Saikyou Shu Nekomimi Shoujo to Deau

altTitles.en: The beast tamer who got kicked out from the hero party, meets a cat girl from the superior race.
The Beast Tamer Who Got Kicked Out from the Hero Party, Meets A Nekomimi Girl from the Superior Race

altTitles.zh-ro: Bèi yǒngzhě duìwǔ kāichú de yù shòu shǐ, xièhòule zuìqiáng zhǒng de māo ěr shàonǚ

altTitles.ko-ro: Yongsa patieseo chubangdanghan biseuteu teimeo, choegangjong-in goyang-igwi sonyeowa mannada

altTitles.es: El Domador de Bestias Exiliado del Grupo

description.en: Because Rein was a weak and simple beast tamer, he was expelled from the hero's group but that didn't stop his desire to be an adventurer. By taking simple quests afterwards he has a destined encounter with a strong cat girl.
description.es: Debido a que Rein era un domador de bestias débil y simple, fue expulsado del grupo del héroe, pero eso no detuvo su deseo de ser un aventurero. Al realizar misiones simples después, tiene un encuentro destinado con una niña gata fuerte.
description.pt-br: O domador de feras Rein, que usa animais, era um membro do grupo do herói. No entanto, como não podia fazer mais nada, não conseguiu acompanhar o ritmo da batalha. “Você só sabe brincar com os animais. Está despedido’. Rein é expulso do grupo e agora vive livremente como um aventureiro. Em sua jornada, ele conhece uma garota de uma tribo de gatos, a chamada espécie mais forte. Por outro lado, o grupo do herói permanece inconsciente de que seu sucesso anterior foi tudo graças a Rein… Esta é a história de um domador de feras que não se segura mais e seu fatídico encontro com uma companheira preciosa.

title.en: Puberty, an All Boys School!? and Nakano-kun

altTitles.ja: 思春期と男子校!?と中野くん

description.en: Hajime Nakano is forced by his mother to enroll at a newly opened all boys high school, and he laments over having to spend the next three years surrounded by other guys. However, he doesn't know that all of the other students are girls secretly pretending to be guys, and each of them think they are the only girl in the whole school.

title.en: S.L.H - Stray Love Hearts!

altTitles.ja: S・L・H ~ストレイ・ラブ・ハーツ~
S・L・H ストレイ・ラブ・ハーツ!

description.en: On the eve of her sixteenth birthday, Kozue Hiyoki is visited in her dreams by a man who steals her heart- literally! Determined to find him and retrieve her stolen heart, Hiyoki, with the color of the man's hair and the tattoo on his chest as her only leads, enrolls in the S-Hall dormitories of St. Nazareth Academy, but quickly realizes that its residents are not at all like she expected… For starters, they're all guys! There, Hiyoki soon discovers that she has the ability to look inside her dorm-mates' dreams, which may be the key to uncovering the identity of the thief who stole her heart…. But perhaps her biggest challenge is that most of the guys won't let Hiyoki into their rooms, much less their hearts!

title.en: Vigilante

description.en:
The law is flawed and I'll be the one who will make it perfect. Blame the law that released you.  
  
Art done by the creator of [HIVE](https://www.webtoons.com/en/thriller/hive/list?title_no=65).
  
[Official Trad. Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/feifazhengyi/list?title_no=1434&page=1)  
 [Official Thai](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/vigilante/list?title_no=1488&page=1)
description.pt-br: A lei é falha e serei eu quem a tornará perfeita. Culpe a lei que te soltou.

title.en: The Secret of the Partner Next to You

description.en: Yang Kiryong is an ordinary high school boy who has a classmate named Yoo Jae-Kyung, who is somewhat clumsy and clueless. Both have a very good friendship, but without any kind of love attraction. Until one day, by chance, Kiryong discovered the deepest secret of his friend and because of this his heart began to beat, will it be beats of fear or love?
description.ko:
평범한 남자 고등학생 양기룡.
그리고 언제나 헤실헤실하고 가끔 나사빠진 행동을 하는
그의 짝꿍 유재경.
그럭저럭 귀엽다고 생각되는 반 친구였을 뿐인데..
어느 날 우연히 그녀의 위험한 비밀을 알게 된다.
이 심장의 두근거림은 두려움인지, 설렘인지..?
description.es-la: Yang Kiryong es un chico de preparatoria común y corriente, que tiene una compañera de clase llamada Yoo Jae-Kyung, la cual es algo torpe y despistada. Ambos tienen una muy buena amistad, pero sin ningún tipo de atracción amorosa. Hasta que un día, por casualidad, Kiryong descubrió el secreto más profundo de su amiga y debido a esto su corazón empezó a latir, ¿serán latidos de miedo o amor?
description.pt-br: Yang Kiryong é um garoto comum do ensino médio que tem uma colega de classe chamada Yoo Jae-Kyung, que é um pouco desajeitada e sem noção. Ambos têm uma amizade muito boa, mas sem nenhum tipo de atração amorosa. Até que um dia, por acaso, Kiryong descobriu o segredo mais profundo de sua amiga. Por causa disso seu coração começou a bater, será de medo ou de amor?

title.en: The Story of the Fox Who Was Late Getting Married and Came to be My Bride

altTitles.ja: 嫁ぎ遅れた狐が嫁に来る話

description.en:
One day, Goro is taking a walk on the mountain behind his house and comes across a fox lying upside down on the side of the road... 

The fox yells 'Hey you! Got a moment?'  And well, if you've seen the title you know the rest.  

This is a cute and fluffy romcom about a fox's wedding.

title.en: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.ja: クラスで２番目に可愛い女の子と友だちになった

altTitles.en: I Became Friends with the Second Cutest Girl in My Class

altTitles.ja-ro: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.id: Aku Berteman dengan Gadis Paling Cantik Kedua di Kelas ku

altTitles.it: Sono diventato amico con la seconda ragazza più carina nella mia classe

description.en:
I, Maehara Maki, someone who couldn’t make any acquaintances or friends in high school, finally had someone I can hang out with outside of school. A girl.

Her name was Asanagi-san. The boys in my class called her ‘The class’ second cutest girl’ behind her back.

On Fridays, she would refuse her best friend, Amami, ‘the cutest girl in class’ invitation just to hang out in my house with me.

Together, we played games, watched some movies, read some manga while eating junk foods like pizza and hamburgers, and chugging cola without a care in the world. To others, we may seem sloppy, but it was a precious, secret time together for Asanagi-san and myself.
description.id:
Aku, Maehara Maki, seseorang yang tidak memiliki kenalan atau teman di SMA, akhirnya memiliki seseorang yang bisa aku ajak bergaul di luar sekolah. Seorang gadis.

Namanya Asanagi-san. Anak-anak laki-laki di kelas saya memanggilnya 'Gadis paling imut kedua di kelas' di belakangnya.

Pada hari Jumat, dia akan menolak ajakan sahabatnya, Amami, 'gadis paling manis di kelas' hanya untuk berkumpul di rumah ku dengan ku.

Bersama-sama, kami bermain game, menonton film, membaca manga sambil makan junk food seperti pizza dan hamburger, dan menenggak cola tanpa peduli dengan dunia. Bagi orang lain, kami mungkin terlihat ceroboh, tetapi itu adalah waktu yang berharga, waktu rahasia bersama untuk Asanagi-san dan ku sendiri.
description.es-la: Yo, Maehara Maki, alguien que no podía conocer ni hacer amigos en la escuela secundaria, finalmente tenía a alguien con quien podía pasar el rato fuera de la escuela. Una mujer. Su nombre era Asanagi-san. Los chicos de mi clase la llamaban "La segunda chica más linda de la clase'" a sus espaldas. Los viernes, rechazaba la invitación de su mejor amiga, Amami, "la chica más linda de la clase" solo para pasar el rato en mi casa conmigo. Juntos, jugamos, vimos algunas películas, leímos manga mientras comíamos comida chatarra como pizza y hamburguesas, y tomábamos refrescos de cola sin preocuparnos por nada. Para otros, podemos parecer descuidados, pero fue un tiempo secreto y precioso para Asanagi-san y para mí.
description.pt-br:
Eu, Maehara Maki, alguém que não conseguia conhecer ou fazer amigos no ensino médio, finalmente consegui alguém com quem eu pudesse sair fora da escola. Uma garota.

O nome dela era Asanagi-san. Os meninos da minha turma a chamavam de 'a segunda garota mais fofa da turma' pelas costas.

Às sextas-feiras, ela recusava o convite de sua melhor amiga, Amami, 'a garota mais fofa da classe' só para ficar na minha casa comigo.

Juntos, jogamos, assistimos a alguns filmes, lemos alguns mangás enquanto comíamos junk food como pizza e hambúrgueres e bebíamos refrigerantes sem nenhuma preocupação no mundo. Para outros, podemos parecer desleixados, mas foi um tempo precioso e secreto juntos para Asanagi-san e eu.
